import { extend } from "lodash";
 
import styleMemoize from "../../../utils/style-memoize";
import getSiteVars from "../site.var";
 
import {unitMath} from "../../../utils/css-utils";
 
export default styleMemoize(function () {
 
  const siteVars = getSiteVars();
 
  const {
    // absoluteBorderRadius,
    // bestTextColor,
    // black,
    borderColor,
    // circularRadius,
    // darkWhite,
    // darkWhiteActive,
    // darkWhiteHover,
    defaultBorderRadius,
    defaultDuration,
    defaultEasing,
    // disabledOpacity,
    // disabledTextColor,
    // firstReadableColor,
    floatingShadow,
    // focusedFormBorderColor,
    // focusedFormMutedBorderColor,
    // fontSize,
    // fullBlack,
    // getAbsoluteSize,
    // getActiveColor,
    // getBackgroundColor,
    getBorderColor,
    // getColor,
    // getDownColor,
    // getFocusColor,
    // getHeaderColor,
    // getHoverColor,
    // getInvertedBackgroundColor,
    // getLightActiveColor,
    // getLightColor,
    // getLightDownColor,
    // getLightFocusColor,
    // getLightHoverColor,
    getRelativeSize,
    // getSize,
    // getTextColor,
    // glyphWidth,
    // headerFont,
    // headerFontWeight,
    // headerLineHeight,
    headerLineHeightOffset,
    // headerTopMargin,
    // headerBottomMargin,
    // headerSizes,
    // horizontalPadding,
    // hoveredTextColor,
    // iconWidth,
    // inputBackground,
    // inputColor,
    // inputHorizontalPadding,
    // inputLineHeight,
    // inputPlaceholderColor,
    // inputPlaceholderFocusColor,
    // inputVerticalPadding,
    // internalBorderColor,
    // invertedDisabledTextColor,
    // invertedLoaderFillColor,
    // invertedLoaderLineColor,
    // invertedMutedTextColor,
    // invertedSelectedTextColor,
    // invertedTextColor,
    // invertedUnselectedTextColor,
    // lightTextColor,
    lineHeight,
    // linkColor,
    // linkHoverColor,
    // loaderFillColor,
    // loaderLineColor,
    // loaderLineWidth,
    // loaderMargin,
    // loaderOffset,
    // loaderSize,
    // loaderSpeed,
    // midWhite,
    // mutedTextColor,
    // offWhite,
    // pageFont,
    // pressedTextColor,
    // relativeBorderRadius,
    // selectedBorderColor,
    // selectedTextColor,
    // solidBorderColor,
    strongBorderColor,
    // strongTransparentBlack,
    // strongTransparentWhite,
    // subtleGradient,
    subtleShadow,
    // subtleTransparentBlack,
    // textColor,
    // transparentBlack,
    // unselectedTextColor,
    // transparentWhite,
    // verticalPadding,
    // veryStrongTransparentBlack,
    // white,
    // whiteBorderColor,
  } = siteVars;
 
  const verticalMargin = "1em";
  const verticalPadding = "1em";
  const horizontalPadding = "1.5em";
 
  const borderWidth = "1px";
 
  const borderShadow = `0px 0px 0px ${borderWidth} ${strongBorderColor} inset`;
  const shadowShadow = "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)";
 
  const headerDistance = "0rem";
 
  const lineHeightOffset = unitMath(unitMath(lineHeight, "-", "1em"), "/", 2);
 
  const attachedBoxShadow = `0em 0em 0em ${borderWidth} ${borderColor} inset`;
 
  function getBoxShadow(variation) {
    return `0px 0px 0px ${borderWidth} ${getBorderColor(variation)} inset, ${shadowShadow}`;
  }
    
  return extend({}, siteVars, {
    getBoxShadow,
    verticalMargin,
    verticalPadding,
    horizontalPadding,
    padding: `${verticalPadding} ${horizontalPadding}`,
    background: "#F8F8F9",
    lineHeightOffset,
 
    borderRadius: defaultBorderRadius,
    borderWidth,
    borderShadow,
    shadowShadow,
    boxShadow: `${borderShadow}, ${shadowShadow}`,
 
    transition: `
      opacity ${defaultDuration} ${defaultEasing},
      color ${defaultDuration} ${defaultEasing},
      background ${defaultDuration} ${defaultEasing},
      box-shadow ${defaultDuration} ${defaultEasing}
    `,
 
    /* Header */
    headerFontSize: getRelativeSize("large"),
    headerFontWeight: "bold",
    headerDisplay: "block",
    headerDistance,
    headerMargin: `-${headerLineHeightOffset} 0em ${headerDistance} 0em`,
    headerParagraphDistance: "0.25em",
 
    /* Paragraph */
    messageTextOpacity: 0.85,
    messageParagraphMargin: "0.75em",
 
    /* List */
    listOpacity: 0.85,
    listStylePosition: "inside",
    listMargin: "0.5em",
    listItemIndent: "1em",
    listItemMargin: "0.3em",
 
    /* Icon */
    iconDistance: "0.6em",
 
    /* Close Icon */
    closeTopDistance: unitMath(verticalPadding,"-",lineHeightOffset),
    closeRightDistance: "0.5em",
    closeOpacity: 0.7,
    closeTransition: `opacity ${defaultDuration} ${defaultEasing}`,
 
 
    /*-------------------
            Types
    --------------------*/
 
    /* Icon Message */
    iconSize: "3em",
    iconOpacity: 0.8,
    iconContentDistance: "0rem",
    iconVerticalAlign: "middle",
 
    /* Attached */
    attachedXOffset: "-1px",
    attachedYOffset: "-1px",
    attachedBoxShadow,
    attachedBottomBoxShadow: `${attachedBoxShadow},${subtleShadow}`,
 
    /* Floating */
    floatingBoxShadow: `${borderShadow},${floatingShadow}`,
 
  });
});
